name: TONSE
description:
Battle against your friends in arena tank combat! Two players, one screen, one keyboard! Be careful to conserve your health and energy in this epic struggle for victory!

Two players each control a tank, able to switch between firing a normal gun, gatling gun, railgun, and shield. Using the gatling gun, railgun, or shield takes energy, and you can't get it back. Last man standing wins.

Controls were designed on a laptop so they should be no trouble for anyone
